```{r}
#clean the data
chdf2018<-replace_with_na(chdf2018,replace=list(hv111 = c(8,9),
                                      hv113 = c(8,9),
                                      hv121 = c(9),
                                      hv201 = c(97,99),
                                      hv104 = 9,
                                      hv205 = 99,
                                      hv206=9,
                                      hv207=9,
                                      hv208=9,
                                      hv209=9,
                                      hv210=9,
                                      hv211=9,
                                      hv212=9,
                                      hv227=9,
                                      hv221=9,
                                      hv106=c(8,9),
                                      hv107=c(98,99),
                                      hv110=9,
                                      hml35=c(6,9),
                                      hc2=c(9994,9995,9996,9999),
                                      hc3=c(9994,9995,9996,9999),
                                      ha2=c(9994,9995,9996,9999),
                                      ha3=c(9994,9995,9996,9999)
                                      ))


```

```{r}
#organise binary data
chdf2018["hv121"] <- ifelse(chdf2018$hv121 == 1 | chdf2018$hv121 == 2, 
                                   1, 0)
chdf2018["hv025"] <- ifelse(chdf2018$hv121 == 1, 
                                   1, 0)
chdf2018["hv270"] <- ifelse(chdf2018$hv270<3,1,0)

```

```{r}
for (x in 1:nrow(chdf2018)){
  if (chdf2018$hv105[x]<5){
    chdf2018$BMI[x]<-(chdf2018$hc2[x]/10)/(chdf2018$hc3[x]/1000)**2
    chdf2018$heightage[x]<-(chdf2018$hc3[x]/1000)/(chdf2018$hc1[x]/12)
    chdf2018$weightage[x]<-(chdf2018$hc2[x]/10)/(chdf2018$hc1[x]/12)
  }
  else{
    chdf2018$BMI[x]<-(chdf2018$hc2[x]/10)/(chdf2018$hc3[x]/1000)**2
    chdf2018$heightage[x]<-(chdf2018$hc3[x]/1000)/(chdf2018$hc1[x])
    chdf2018$weightage[x]<-(chdf2018$hc2[x]/10)/(chdf2018$hc1[x])
  }
}
```
